Description: Gold necklace composed of: (a) fifty-two disc-shaped gold beads; (b) eight small rounded gold beads; (c) two cowrie-shell beads.
Bibliographic references: Jewellery / Catalogue of the Jewellery, Greek, Etruscan, and Roman, in the Departments of Antiquities, British Museum. (787)
Acquisition name: Bequeathed by: Sir Augustus Wollaston Franks
